Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Nothing really changed, i still value teacher feedback more and ive never directly implemented a gen ai suggestion/feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Again i only take ai feedback at a face value as it lacks the expertise and emotion that my teachers have.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Gen ai feedback always feels so surface level, compared to a teacher's directed feedback.
